Author: investCo
Title: 🚀🚀🚀[ANN][PRE-ICO LIVE]🚀🚀🚀HOLDVEST: Universal gateway to the crypto markets
Body: Thanks for your wishes. Actually, we want our platform to work on Waves blockchain due to advantages described above (low fee, fast transactions etc). More details regarding why we choose Waves will be in our article tomorrow. But for some investors, who don't want to create special Waves wallet, we're considering an option to issue an ERC-20 token with an easy swap to Waves blockchain. Now we need to estimate the interest for this option, to make the final decision.

Author: Cassius
Title: 🚀🚀🚀[ANN][PRE-ICO LIVE]🚀🚀🚀HOLDVEST: Universal gateway to the crypto markets
Body: I'd say Waves is absolutely the right platform for this use case. There are many reasons for that, including fast and cheap txs and easy token creation. That's going to be pretty important for HOLDVEST as they create tradeable index funds and burn tokens collected as fees. I can't see that would work on Ethereum very well; it would require a different business model. But as said above, the blockchain itself barely matters. It's all going to be under the hood in the HOLDVEST platform anyway. What matters is that it works efficiently. You won't need to interact directly with the blockchain in question unless you specifically choose to.

Author: Cassius
Title: 🚀🚀🚀[ANN][PRE-ICO LIVE]🚀🚀🚀HOLDVEST: Universal gateway to the crypto markets
Body: This seems an odd comment. There's no denying that Ethereum has a larger community and a market cap perhaps 100x more, which makes a big difference on the speculative secondary market. But you're talking about a $5m cap platform with working software and a unique proposal, and a token model that will be driven by fundamentals (real-time buyback and burn using fees). I like Ethereum, I think it's a pretty amazing platform, but it's just not designed for this kind of mass-market application. The tx fees alone on Ethereum would kill any application like HOLDVEST.

We aim to connect decentralized exchanges (DEX) along with centralized ones. It would be possible to use our token on other blockchains such as Ethereum, Bitshares and other with the help of Atomic Swap technology, which is currently being tested on many blockchains. So decentralized services are our main goal combined with intuitive and easy to use UI.

Author: investCo
Title: 🚀🚀🚀[ANN][PRE-ICO LIVE]🚀🚀🚀HOLDVEST: Universal gateway to the crypto markets
Body: Holdvest doesn't 'list' ICOs, people will be able to run their ICOs on the platform. The ICO Founder includes the option to create and issue tokens on both Waves and Ethereum, two of the most popular blockchains for ICO initiatives.  ● Waves features straightforward and low-cost token creation, fast transactions and an automatic market on the built-in decentralised exchange. ● Ethereum features Turing-complete smart contracts and is the market leader for smart contract applications. As the second-largest crypto by market cap, Ethereum has a very large community of developers and supporters.  The ICO Founder tool will make the process of token creation and distribution on either network painless, entirely removing the technical overheads associated with holding an ICO. All that will be required to start an ICO on HOLDVEST will be to register on the platform, create the ICO campaign by filling in a form with the required parameters (token supply, funding targets/caps, etc), and to pay the commission fee in HDL tokens. Different ICO structures will be supported, including various price models, duration of campaigns, bonuses and discounts, and other parameters.

Author: investCo
Title: 🚀🚀🚀[ANN][PRE-ICO LIVE]🚀🚀🚀HOLDVEST: Universal gateway to the crypto markets
Body: https://i.imgur.com/sKt78XU.jpg http://i.imgur.com/B9Gao2E.jpg http://i.imgur.com/93dwaVX.jpg https://i.imgur.com/IT5cB4f.jpg    https://i.imgur.com/2y1sTvy.png       https://i.imgur.com/czF8mhP.png       https://i.imgur.com/232pTrM.png   https://i.imgur.com/p4LCLjv.png       https://i.imgur.com/4vPixRo.png       http://i.imgur.com/mlq9tgq.png    HOLDVEST All-in-one investment portal  Decentralised ecosystem for investment in blockchain technology. No need to be crypto guru to invest in the most stable and promising cryptocurrencies and blockchain projects. Simply sign up to our platform, fund your account with any of the most popular cryptocurrencies and invest in any blockchain project with one click.   https://i.imgur.com/NLpZLAS.png  HOLDVEST is a new kind of blockchain investment platform that combines the best features of exchanges, brokerages, and instant trading apps. The platform is built around a liquidity aggregator connected to all major crypto exchanges, as well as its own internal decentralised exchange, enabling users to gain the best price for their trades from a single portal. Along with powerful tools for portfolio management, HOLDVEST, therefore, offers exceptional security, convenience and flexibility, and is suitable for experienced traders, institutional investors and newcomers alike.   https://i.imgur.com/UH5OJlg.png  The HOLDVEST platform has already been launched and will be monetised by means of the HDL token, which is hosted on the Waves blockchain.  The functions of the HDL token include but are but not limited to: ● Discounts on trading fees. Users will be able to save up to 20% on standard trading fees by paying with HDL. Since fees are typically calculated as a proportion of order size, if HDL tokens rise in value then a smaller amount will be required to pay the equivalent value in the traded currencies. Buying HDL at ICO therefore represents the ability to pre-purchase trading activity at a favorable rate.  ● Buyback program. When an order is fulfilled on a trade and the user does not pay fees with HDL, a standard commission is charged as a percentage of the total order amount. When the HDL buyback program is started, every such operation on the HOLDVEST platform is immediately converted to a market BUY order for HDL tokens across supported exchanges. Therefore every trade represents demand for HDL.  ● Decreasing supply. 50% of tokens submitted as fees (or bought using trading fees in non-HDL currencies), or otherwise used in payment for services on the HOLDVEST platform, will be burned. This is achieved either by destroying them with the functionality built into the Waves token launcher or by sending them to a provably unspendable address. This will decrease supply over time and place constant demand on the market. The remaining 50% of HDL collected in day-to-day activity will be held by the team. This can more succinctly be stated as: HDL tokens equivalent in value to 50% of all profits collected by HOLDVEST will be burned.  ● ICO listing and voting. The HDL token can be used to participate in platform development. This includes voting to list new cryptocurrencies and to support new ICOs; rating ICOs in terms of business model and trustworthiness of teams as a form of collective due diligence; and implementing new functionality of various forms on the platform.  ● Advertising. One of HOLDVEST’s revenue streams will come from selling advertising space on its platform. HDL will be the default token of payment for this service.  ● Unlocking advanced features. Users who hold HDL tokens within their portfolios will be able to unlock additional premium services on the platform. They will gain access to margin trading; be able to set advanced trading orders that are not available to other users (Limit orders, Stop market and Stop-Limit orders), as well as controlling Stop Loss and Take Profit parameters; and be sent alerts for arbitrage opportunities and other useful features that will allow them to generate additional profits.  https://i.imgur.com/K44Z7GX.jpg https://i.imgur.com/Pmdcp2T.png https://i.imgur.com/CFswAEH.jpg https://i.imgur.com/8ALyj0j.jpg https://i.imgur.com/MDuDtUS.png  Try out the beta website now at www.holdvest.com  Meet Pie chart for your Portfolio. Start by building your own!  https://i.imgur.com/jk4DuPU.png  Stay tuned for updates  [/quote]

Author: kagami_
Title: 🚀🚀🚀[ANN][PRE-ICO LIVE]🚀🚀🚀HOLDVEST: Universal gateway to the crypto markets
Body: 1) I absolutely love this and the working platform is nice although I expect it to be improved dramatically once they get some funding.  2) I do think the platform needs more options and some touch ups, especially the additional options and even advanced options would be highly appreciated functions.  3) I like the platform's simplicity as well. Hardcap could be a bit higher, IMO. But I would also think additional value could be added with so much funding (even 5M.)  4) It has a very real, real, real use in the world. As SOON as I saw that something like this was available I signed up for an account.  5) I can't believe I didn't think of this ...

Author: investCo
Title: 🚀🚀🚀[ANN][PRE-ICO LIVE]🚀🚀🚀HOLDVEST: Universal gateway to the crypto markets
Body: Thank you very much for your detailed feedback. We already working on improving HOLDVEST in both UX and functionality directions. Getting funded significantly accelerate this process and increase the quantity and quality of new features being implemented.  Regarding Hardcap, yes, indeed, it's not overvalued amount. It's the carefully estimated amount, needed to implement all declared features in Roadmap, and not an arbitrary number from the head like many other projects do. Overestimated amounts raised during ICO for projects that don't understand how the will spend them, usually results in big problems now. We do not want to repeat their mistakes.  So our main goals are to align the business with its capitalization, lead the product to the next level, and raise the price of the token, sustaining constant demand for HDL.
